transcript: if you're that solopreneur there are only four things that you can do to get leads you reach out to people you know you reach out to people you don't know you post content and you run ads that's it that's all there is and if you're not doing those four things whether it's to get Affiliates to get customers to get employees to get agencies it doesn't matter because those are the only four things that one person can do to let other people know about their stuff so if you're not getting enough leads you're not doing enough of that
